attributes.additional_details:
Abu Qatada, who has been released from prison for incitement of hatred for British citizens, has been re-housed in larger, more expensive accommodation together with his family of six, at the British taxpayer's expense.
His relatives, living in Amman, Jordan, without fear of persecution, report that he is"enjoying his new home and is the happiest man in Britain"

Qatada entered Britain in 1993 on a false passport, and has remained here due to yet another ruling from the European Court of Human Rights.

Please join me in demanding that the Home Secretary orders immediate deportation of this person, and re-afirms the right of Sovereignty in Britain.
